# Ignore files and directories that are specific to my local development environment
*.DS_Store
*.log
*.swp

# Ignore files and directories that are generated by the build process
bin/
build/
dist/
lib/
obj/

# Ignore files and directories that contain sensitive information
*.pem
*.key
*.crt
*.csr
secrets/

# Ignore files and directories related to Java
*.class
*.jar
*.war
*.ear

# Ignore Eclipse project files
.classpath
.project
.settings/

# Ignore IntelliJ IDEA project files
.idea/
*.iml

# Ignore NetBeans project files
nbproject/
*.ipr
*.iws

# Ignore Maven build files
target/
